description:
We are hiring a Learning & Development Consultant to start immediately!

Location: New Haven CT

Schedule: Monday – Friday | 8AM – 5PM | Hybrid

The Learning & development Consultant will advise leadership and facilitate enterprise initiatives. Plans, develops, implements, evaluates and administers organizational leadership and development programs and services. Responsible for development and integration

of key initiatives and, leads multiple projects to achieve strategic business goals and operational objectives.

· Designs and recommends organizational development strategies, initiatives, programs and interventions.

· Anticipates organizational impacts of current and future business strategies and develops/provides advice, action plans and interventions to

minimize risk and increases organizational performance.

· Leads the development of organizational and individual effectiveness/performance assessments and the development of recommendations

that enable proactive management of business and people issues and risks.

· Partners with, includes and/or interacts with other HR staff and directors to increase organizational effectiveness,

· Provides leadership in change management and transformation by consulting on and developing strategic and tactical approaches and practices.

· Provides a broad range of consultative services to all levels of employees.

· Ability to design and deliver learning and development interventions within the context of a larger organizational development agenda and talent management programs such as performance management, leadership development, developmental 360 feedback,

coaching, and individual development planning.

· Demonstrated proficiency with organizational development (OD) principles and tools, such as strategic planning, organizational analysis, needs assessment, team effectiveness, cultural assessment, organizational design, goal setting, instructional design, process improvement, optimizing performance, and expert facilitation.

Additional Skills & Qualifications:

· Master’s Degree Preferred

· 6 years of experience in Organizational Development, Change Management, Human Resources, Psychology, or a related field

· Excellent Communication Skills,

organizational and time management skills

· Workday Experience

About Aston Carter:
